name: Vu's Homestay
address: TTDL Phong Nha - Sơn Trạch - Bố Trạch - Quảng Bình, Phong Nha, Việt Nam
description:
Vu's Homestay có hồ bơi ngoài trời, khu vườn, phòng chờ chung và sân hiên ở Phong Nha. Chỗ nghỉ này có các tiện nghi như quầy bar và nhiều tiện nghi thể thao dưới nước. Chỗ nghỉ có chỗ đậu xe riêng miễn phí và có cả dịch vụ đưa đón sân bay mất phí.

Tại khách sạn, các phòng được thiết kế có ban công. Ngoài phòng tắm riêng với vòi sen và đồ vệ sinh cá nhân miễn phí, các phòng tại Vu's Homestay cũng có Wi-Fi miễn phí, trong đó một số phòng có view núi. Tại chỗ nghỉ, các phòng đều có điều hòa và két an toàn.

Khách có thể chơi bi-a, bóng bàn và trò phi tiêu tại Vu's Homestay. Ngoài ra, đi xe đạp là hoạt động được ưa chuộng trong khu vực.

Sân bay gần nhất là Sân bay Đồng Hới, cách khách sạn 38 km.

review.room_type: Phòng Có 2 Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Không gian tuyệt vời,  chủ nhà thân thiện,  nếu lần sau đi  Phong Nha vẫn sẽ đặt phòng tại đây

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive: Phòng rộng rãi, thoải mái, cô chủ nhệt tình, tiếc là trời mưa nên không xuống hồ bơi được 😅
review.comment_negative: Wifi chập chờn, lúc được lúc không

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Chỗ ở gần trung tâm Phong Nha, chủ nhà thân thiện và nhiệt tình, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Mình sẽ quay lại khi có dịp.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We were a bit concerned from the photos, as the room looked a bit dark, but we were so lucky that we booked this hotel, as the room had big windows and was much brighter than in photos.

Room we stayed was clean and spacious, much better than in photos, bathroom was awesome, with outdoor shower, beds were big and comfy. The pool was great for resting (from all the hotels with pools im Vietnam, is the only one we actually tried, as the atmosphere around it was welcoming).

The host helped with a lot of information, an did our stay even better.

The Location was also close to the best restaurants in town and close to the bus station. Not so close to Oxalis but Oxalis provides pick up and drop off from the town in any way, so was not an issue at all.

Overall for the price (one of the lowest) we stayed in much better hotel than we expected, as we had just a night there. Could easily stay a week without thinking twice!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive:
Great homestay.
Super friendly and helpful owners.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive: friendly, courtesy, helpful and centered .

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive: Owner is super friendly and care about the guests. We are doing a trip from Hanoi to HCMC by bike and saw him cleaning our mirrors and helmets without asking.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Nice room, early checking they allow us to sleep in dorm. host were very friendly. They helped us to book a bus for Hue.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved our stay - they offered fantastic deals on local tours, laundry was cheap, there was free tea and coffee, and it was in a great location.

The staff were so kind and accommodating. We had to wait for several hours for a bus to a different and were offered a shower and tea. 

Honestly just an awesome place to stay.
review.comment_negative: Soundproofing wasn't great and the shower went cold quickly.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Vu’s homestay is a gorgeous place to stay, lovely clean pool and big rooms!
review.comment_negative: The upstairs bar / social area is a bit unused/sad. We didn’t see anyone else up there but there was a fab pool table.

review.room_type: Phòng Có 2 Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Không gian tuyệt vời,  chủ nhà thân thiện,  nếu lần sau đi  Phong Nha vẫn sẽ đặt phòng tại đây

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive: Owner is super friendly and care about the guests. We are doing a trip from Hanoi to HCMC by bike and saw him cleaning our mirrors and helmets without asking.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Nice room, early checking they allow us to sleep in dorm. host were very friendly. They helped us to book a bus for Hue.

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive:
We absolutely loved our stay - they offered fantastic deals on local tours, laundry was cheap, there was free tea and coffee, and it was in a great location.

The staff were so kind and accommodating. We had to wait for several hours for a bus to a different and were offered a shower and tea. 

Honestly just an awesome place to stay.
review.comment_negative: Soundproofing wasn't great and the shower went cold quickly.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive: Vu’s homestay is a gorgeous place to stay, lovely clean pool and big rooms!
review.comment_negative: The upstairs bar / social area is a bit unused/sad. We didn’t see anyone else up there but there was a fab pool table.

review.room_type: Phòng Có 2 Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Không gian tuyệt vời,  chủ nhà thân thiện,  nếu lần sau đi  Phong Nha vẫn sẽ đặt phòng tại đây

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive: Phòng rộng rãi, thoải mái, cô chủ nhệt tình, tiếc là trời mưa nên không xuống hồ bơi được 😅
review.comment_negative: Wifi chập chờn, lúc được lúc không

review.room_type: Phòng Deluxe Có Giường Cỡ King
review.comment_positive: Chỗ ở gần trung tâm Phong Nha, chủ nhà thân thiện và nhiệt tình, phòng ốc sạch sẽ, thoáng mát. Mình sẽ quay lại khi có dịp.

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Nhìn Ra Núi
review.comment_positive:
We were a bit concerned from the photos, as the room looked a bit dark, but we were so lucky that we booked this hotel, as the room had big windows and was much brighter than in photos.

Room we stayed was clean and spacious, much better than in photos, bathroom was awesome, with outdoor shower, beds were big and comfy. The pool was great for resting (from all the hotels with pools im Vietnam, is the only one we actually tried, as the atmosphere around it was welcoming).

The host helped with a lot of information, an did our stay even better.

The Location was also close to the best restaurants in town and close to the bus station. Not so close to Oxalis but Oxalis provides pick up and drop off from the town in any way, so was not an issue at all.

Overall for the price (one of the lowest) we stayed in much better hotel than we expected, as we had just a night there. Could easily stay a week without thinking twice!

review.room_type: Phòng Giường Đôi Lớn
review.comment_positive:
Great homestay.
Super friendly and helpful owners.
